The mob attacked the first two villagesUngwar Kerau and Unwar Dawaand burned Christian homes and churches. No one was killed, they said. By that afternoon, news of the first attacks reached the third village, Ungwar Tuji. In Ungwar Tuji, two Hausa-Fulani PDP supporting Christians were killed. The Christian men in the village sent their families across the river for safety and prepared to defend their homes.
